an4.255:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these four ignoble quests.[n.965] As atMN 26.6, I 6–62, but the latter is augmented by two more quests: for what is subject to sorrow and for what is subject to defilement. The noble quests are atMN 46.4, I 62–63.What four?
an4.255:2: "There are, bhikkhus, these four noble quests. What four?
